1111.content:
Ragna the Bloodedge was on his usual journey to sabotage the cauldrons, they were used to summon the Prime Devices, Murakumo, should he destroy all of them, would he find peace? He had wondered, it was only then until he encountered a familiar man in a secluded location... Terumi...

Terumi was a man who burned down the church in the past, killing the nuns and kidnapping both Saya and Jin.

"Oh, Rags? Is that you again?" The lean, green-haired man in a suit asked, tipping his fedora. "Ah, it's been forever! How have you been?" He chirped.

Ragna prepared his weapon, the Blood-Scythe. It was given to him by Jubei, used by a hero that saved the world and gave more time for the Six Heroes to defeat the Black Beast. "Yeah, it's me. The guy who is gonna take that stupid hat and shove it down your throat... Terumi!" Ragna muttered threateningly in response.

"You never learn, do you? Plus, my name goes by HAZAMA now, by the way..." Terumi responded, taking off his hat, in an instance, his polite looking structure was replaced by an ungodly, terrifying one as his hair spiked up, and Ouroboros surrounded him. "Well, you little piece of shit... do you really think you can take me on this time?! I'll warn you... I have a new trick up my sleeve, and there is nothing you can do about it..!! Kyahahahaha!"

Ragna gripped the sword's hilt tightly, "I'll take you on any day and come back to kill you if I fail!" he shouted, "Restriction 666 released... Dimensional Interference Field deployed... BlazBlue... ACTIVATE!" he mumbled. Usually, the grimoire would respond to this, it didn't seem to work this time around however... correctly. Instead, it shone brightly, engulfing him... "Wh... what the hell?!"

"See, Ragna, I took the liberty of changing things around in this shift, I think you should be pleased..." Terumi said, giving an awful smirk.

The attack sent Tao flying and Ragna took a moment to glare down at her large ample breasts and growl. "God dammit!”

She flew and landed roughly on the ground and skid across it until she came to a full stop. Tao moaned as she held her head and shook it. Getting rid of he dizziness from that blow.

121.content: Noel Vermillion sat in her NOL uniform outside one of the many restaurants in Kagasuchi, the sun beaming own on the back of her neck, her blue beret left on the table, letting her long blond hair hang down. In front of her was a delicious, steaming meat bun along with a drink in an oriental style mug. Briefly looking over her shoulder in case of a certain hooded catgirl, Noel began to enjoy her meal.
121.title: Noel and the meatbun

choices: "Makoto and Tsubaki! They'll know what to do!"
Noel heard a distant cry shouting "boobie lady!" before being pounced upon.
Before she could do anything, her breasts grew again!
1211.content:
Noel turned to take a swig of her drink, bumping into it and knocking it off the table. Before it smashed on the ground, she grabbed swiftly, placing it back on the table. Reminded her of the reflex training exercises she used to have to do with her friends Makoto and Tsubaki at the academy. Those were the worst! Come to think of it, she hadn't seen her friends in a while, maybe they were due a visit!
Getting up from the table, she felt a sudden weight on her chest that wasn't there before. She froze, slowly looking down only to see the top of her uniform bulging out, like she stuffed two oranges down her shirt. She stifled a scream, covering her mouth. She'd always been very flat chested, to the point where that insensitive girl from the kaka village had taken to calling her "lacking lady". Now she had these orbs attached to her chest, it all seemed so surreal.
She snatched her beret from the table, what would she do now?
1211.title: Lacking lady?

12113.content:
Noel turned to leave, putting her beret back on, she began walking down street. Her now much larger chest took some getting used to. She arched her back slightly to counter the new weight, only to have them protrude even more, causing her to blush. She began to notice small bumps rising on her new chest, her nipples were beginning to show through her uniform. Blushing even harder, she turned and went down a quiet alley to hide herself.
Covering her chest with her hand, partly to keep some dignity, partly to stop them hitting her in the face, she quickly ran down the dark alley. Suddenly, losing her balance, she fell face first almost planting her face into the ground. Luckily something broke her fall, her now even larger breasts! They must have grown and thrown her off balance.
She slowly got up, getting used to the extra weight again. How much bigger could they get? They were already the size of...coconuts? Melons maybe? They were almost the same size as Makoto's! Wiping the dust off her now stretched uniform and fixing her little red tie, she heard footsteps behind her...
